asset_name_translations.en: CEF eID and the eIDAS Regulation

description_translations.en: The eIDAS solution allows citizens from Member States to prove and verify their identification when accessing on-line services in other Member States. It allows citizens to authenticate themselves by using their eIDs and connecting with their Identity Provider (IdP) from their country.
description_translations.es: La solución eIDAS permite a los ciudadanos de los Estados miembros demostrar y verificar su identificación cuando acceden a servicios en línea en otros Estados miembros. Permite a los ciudadanos autenticarse utilizando sus eIDs y conectándose con su proveedor de identidad (IdP) de su país.
description_translations.it: La soluzione eIDAS consente ai cittadini degli Stati membri di provare e verificare la propria identificazione quando accedono a servizi online in altri Stati membri. Consente ai cittadini di autenticarsi utilizzando i propri eID e collegandosi con il proprio provider di identità (IdP) dal proprio paese.
description_translations.lv: eIDAS risinājums lauj citu dalībvalstu pilsoņiem pierādīt un pārbaudīt viņu identitāti, piekļūstot citu dalībvalstu tiešsaistes pakalpojumiem. Tas ļauj pilsoņiem autentificēties, izmantojot eID un savienojoties ar viņu valsts identitātes pakalpojuma sniedzēju (IdP).

description_translations.en:
Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) aims at explaining how to make the Web content more accessible to the people with disabilities. It generally applies to the public services delivered as Web applications, and refers to the information in a web page of the applciation, including both the content (text, images, sounds, ...) and structure (markup, presentation, styles).


  • defines a set of guidelines with corresponding testable success criteria across different levels
  • based on the accessibility principles: perceivable, operable, understandable, robust.
description_translations.es:
Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) aims at explaining how to make the Web content more accessible to the people with disabilities. It generally applies to the public services delivered as Web applications, and refers to the information in a web page of the applciation, including both the content (text, images, sounds, ...) and structure (markup, presentation, styles).


  • defines a set of guidelines with corresponding testable success criteria across different levels
  • based on the accessibility principles: perceivable, operable, understandable, robust.
description_translations.it:
Le Linee guida per l'accessibilità dei contenuti Web (WCAG) mirano a spiegare come rendere i contenuti Web più accessibili alle persone con disabilità. Si applica generalmente ai servizi pubblici forniti come applicazioni Web e si riferisce alle informazioni in una pagina Web dell'applicazione, inclusi sia il contenuto (testo, immagini, suoni, ...) che la struttura (markup, presentazione, stili).


  • definisce una serie di linee guida con corrispondenti criteri di successo verificabili a diversi livelli
  • basati sui principi di accessibilità: percepibile, utilizzabile, comprensibile, robusto.
description_translations.lv:
Tiešsaistes satura pieejamības vadlīnijas (WCAG) cenšas izskaidrot, kā veidot pieejamāku tiešsaistes saturu personām ar invaliditāti. Tās kopumā attiecas uz tiešsaistē pieejamiem publiskajiem pakalpojumiem saistībā ar informāciju mājaslapā, iekļaujot gan saturu (teksts, attēli, skaņas u.c.), gan struktūru (iezīmēšanas valoda, prezentācija, stils).


  • definē vadlīniju kopumu kopā ar attiecīgiem testējamiem panākumu kritērijiem dažādos līmeņos
  • balstoties uz pieejamības principiem: uztveramību, darboties spēju, saproatamību, izturību.

name_translations.es: Directrices de Accesibilidad al Contenido en la Web del W3C
name_translations.it: Linee guida W3C per contenuto Web accessibile

regulations_and_standards_translations.en: EU Directive 2016/2102 on the accessibility of the websites and mobile applications of public sector bodies

description_translations.en: WSO2 API Manager is a complete platform for building, integrating, and exposing your digital services as managed APIs in the cloud, on-premise, and hybrid architectures to drive your digital transformation strategy. It allows API developers to design, publish, and manage the lifecycle of APIs and API product managers to create API products from one or more APIs.
description_translations.es: WSO2 API Manager es una plataforma completa para construir, integrar y exponer sus servicios digitales como APIs gestionadas en la nube, en las instalaciones y en arquitecturas híbridas para impulsar su estrategia de transformación digital. Permite a los desarrolladores de API diseñar, publicar y gestionar el ciclo de vida de las API y a los gestores de productos de API crear productos de API a partir de una o más APIs.
description_translations.it: WSO2 API Manager è una piattaforma completa per creare, integrare ed esporre i tuoi servizi digitali come API gestite nelle architetture cloud, on-premise e ibride per guidare la tua strategia di trasformazione digitale. Consente agli sviluppatori API di progettare, pubblicare e gestire il ciclo di vita delle API e ai product manager API di creare prodotti API da una o più API.
description_translations.lv: WSO2 API menedžeris ir pilnvērtīga platforma tiešsaistes pakalpojumu veidošanai, integrēšanai un atklāšanai caur vadītiem API mākoņdatos, fiziskajā vidē un hibrīdajās arhitektūrās, tā ļaujot virzīt digitālās transformācijas stratēģiju. Tas ļauj API izstrādātājiem veidot, publicēt un vadīt API dzīves ciklu, bet API produktu vadītājiem veidot API produktus no vienas vai vairākām API.

name_translations.it: WSO2 API Manager

description_translations.en: Event Co-designer (ECO) is an open source plugin for the popular WordPress (WP) content management system which allows co-designing and organising new public events. It is especially designed from the needs of the ZGZ use case and can be integrated directly to the existing Etopia WP website. ECO provides an easy-to-use and feature-rich calendar view to schedule new events and make requests for resources, facilities and services needed to organise the event. In addition, ECO includes collaborative tools for documenting, discussing and co-evaluating the event proposal.
description_translations.es: El codiseñador de eventos (ECO) es un plugin de código abierto para el popular sistema de gestión de contenidos WordPress (WP) que permite codiseñar y organizar nuevos eventos públicos. Está especialmente diseñado a partir de las necesidades del caso de uso de ZGZ y puede integrarse directamente en el sitio web existente de Etopia WP. ECO ofrece una vista de calendario fácil de usar y con muchas funciones para programar nuevos eventos y hacer solicitudes de recursos, instalaciones y servicios necesarios para organizar el evento. Además, ECO incluye herramientas de colaboración para documentar, discutir y coevaluar la propuesta del evento.
description_translations.it: Event Co-designer (ECO) è un plug-in open source per il popolare sistema di gestione dei contenuti WordPress (WP) che consente la co-progettazione e l'organizzazione di nuovi eventi pubblici. È appositamente progettato in base alle esigenze del caso d'uso ZGZ e può essere integrato direttamente nel sito Web Etopia WP esistente. ECO fornisce una visualizzazione calendario facile da usare e ricca di funzionalità per programmare nuovi eventi ed effettuare richieste di risorse, strutture e servizi necessari per organizzare l'evento. Inoltre, ECO include strumenti collaborativi per la documentazione, la discussione e la co-valutazione della proposta dell'evento.
description_translations.lv: Pasākumu kopdizaineris (ECO) ir atvērtā koda spraudnis populārajai WordPress (WP) satura vadības sistēmai, kas ļauj kopīgi veidot un organizēt publiskos pasākumus. Tas ir specifiski veidots Saragosas gadījumam, un to ir iespējams tieši integrēt esošajā Etopia WP mājaslapā. ECO piedāvā viegli lietojamu un ar funkcionalitātēm piepildītu kalendāra skatu jaunu pasākumu plānošanai, kā arī piedāva veidot pieprasījumus resursiem, telpām un pasākumam nepieciešamajiem pakalpojumiem. Papildus tam ECO ietverti arī dokumentu veidošanas, diskusiju un pasākumu pieteikumu kopīgās vērtēšanas sadarbības rīki.

name_translations.it: Event Co-Designer

overview_text.en: Web application for co-designing public events and co-evaluating event proposals

name_translations.it: Grafana

description_translations.en:
AAC is an Open Source platform for identity management, authentication, and authorization. Based on standard security protocols, such as OAuth2.0, OpenID Connect, SAML, SCIM, the tool allows for protecting the APIs and applciations, manage users, authenticate using external Identity Providers performing also Single Sign-On and Single Logout functionality. The tool is compatible with the eID providers and allow for integration of nation-level or cross-country authentication solutions.

More specifically, the tool allows for, but not limited to

  • Multi-tenant management of users, applications, and personal data management in an extensible manner with the custom user attributes (claims) and attribute extraction;
  • User management with email/password based user registration or even passwordless authentication (based on WebAuthn standard)
  • Authentication federation with external providers, and in particular, with eIDAS-compliant solutions, using SAML, OpenId Connect, and OAuth2.0 protocols;
  • Perform OAuth2.0-based authorization and access control with customizable and extensible model of scopes, services, and applications;
  • Perform role-based and attribute-based access control policy implementation for end-users and applications accessing protected APIs.
description_translations.es:
AAC is an Open Source platform for identity management, authentication, and authorization. Based on standard security protocols, such as OAuth2.0, OpenID Connect, SAML, SCIM, the tool allows for protecting the APIs and applciations, manage users, authenticate using external Identity Providers performing also Single Sign-On and Single Logout functionality. The tool is compatible with the eID providers and allow for integration of nation-level or cross-country authentication solutions.

More specifically, the tool allows for, but not limited to

  • Multi-tenant management of users, applications, and personal data management in an extensible manner with the custom user attributes (claims) and attribute extraction;
  • User management with email/password based user registration or even passwordless authentication (based on WebAuthn standard)
  • Authentication federation with external providers, and in particular, with eIDAS-compliant solutions, using SAML, OpenId Connect, and OAuth2. 0 protocols;
  • Perform OAuth2.0-based authorization and access control with customizable and extensible model of scopes, services, and applications;
  • Perform role-based and attribute-based access control policy implementation for end-users and applications accessing protected APIs.
description_translations.it:
AAC è una piattaforma Open Source per la gestione delle identità, l'autenticazione e l'autorizzazione. Basato su protocolli di sicurezza standard, come OAuth2.0, OpenID Connect, SAML, SCIM, lo strumento consente di proteggere le API e le applicazioni, gestire gli utenti, autenticarsi utilizzando provider di identità esterni eseguendo anche funzionalità di Single Sign-On e Single Logout. Lo strumento è compatibile con i fornitori di eID e consente l'integrazione di soluzioni di autenticazione a livello nazionale o cross-country.

In particolare, lo strumento consente, ma non solo,

  • Multi- gestione tenant di utenti, applicazioni e gestione dei dati personali in modo estensibile con gli attributi utente personalizzati (claims) e l'estrazione degli attributi;
  • Gestione degli utenti con registrazione utente basata su e-mail/password o anche autenticazione senza password (basata su Standard WebAuthn)
  • Federazione di autenticazione con provider esterni e, in particolare, con soluzioni conformi a eIDAS, utilizzando i protocolli SAML, OpenId Connect e OAuth2.0;
  • Esegui OAuth2.0- autorizzazione e controllo degli accessi basati su modelli personalizzabili ed estensibili di ambiti, servizi e applicazioni;
  • Esegui l'implementazione di criteri di controllo degli accessi basati su ruoli e attributi per utenti finali e applicazioni che accedono ad API protette.
description_translations.lv:
AAC ir atvērtā koda platforma identitātes kontrolei, autentifikācijai un autorizācijai. Tā ir balstīta uz standarta drošības protokoliem, piemēram, OAuth2.0, OpenID Connect, SAML, SCIM, un tā ļauj aizsargāt API un aplikācijas, kontrolēt lietotājus, veikt autentifikāciju, izmantojot ārējos identitātes pakalpojuma sniedzējus un veicot vienotas pierakstīšanās un izrakstīšanās funkcionalitātes. Rīks ir savietojams ar eID pakalpojumu sniedzējiem un ļauj integrēt nacionālā līmeņa un pārrobežu autentifikācijas risinājumus.

Rīks tostarp ļauj

  • vairāku profilu lietotāju, aplikāciju un personas datu paplašinātu kontroli ar pielāgotiem lietotāju atribūtiem un atribūtu izgūšanu;
  • Lietotāju kontroli ar e-pastā/parolē balstītu reģistrāciju vai autentifikāciju pat bez paroles (balstīta uz WebAuthn standartu);
  • Autentifikācijas federāciju ārējiem pakalpojuma sniedzējiem, jo īpaši ar eIDAS salāgojamiem risinājumiem, izmantojot SAML, OpenId Connect un OAuth2.0 protokolus;
  • Veikt OAuth2.0 balstītu autorizāciju un piekļuves kontroli ar pielāgojamiem un paplašinātiem tvērumu, pakalpojumu un aplikāciju modeļiem;
  • Veikt uz lomām atribūtiem balstītu piekļuves kontroles politikas ieviešanu gala lietotājiem un aplikācijām, kuras piekļūst aizsargātām API.

description_translations.it: Google Charts è una libreria di script Java che fornisce un modo per visualizzare i dati sul tuo sito web (da semplici grafici a linee a complesse mappe ad albero gerarchiche)

description_translations.en: Event Organiser (EVO) is a stand-alone web application to evaluate co-designed event proposals made with the ECO WordPress plugin and organise the events in practice. EVO complements the ZGZ use case by giving administrative tools to foster co-designing of events and implementing the best proposals. EVO comprises features to manage available resources and services and allocate them to requests made in event proposals. In addition, EVO can be used to organise co-evaluation polls to analyse different aspects of the proposal in order to find out which of the proposals are ready for implementation.
description_translations.es: El organizador de eventos (EVO) es una aplicación web independiente para evaluar las propuestas de codiseño de eventos realizadas con el plugin ECO WordPress y organizar los eventos en la práctica. EVO complementa el caso de uso de ZGZ proporcionando herramientas administrativas para fomentar el codiseño de eventos e implementar las mejores propuestas. EVO incluye funciones para gestionar los recursos y servicios disponibles y asignarlos a las solicitudes realizadas en las propuestas de eventos. Además, EVO puede utilizarse para organizar encuestas de coevaluación para analizar diferentes aspectos de la propuesta con el fin de averiguar cuáles de las propuestas están listas para su implementación.
description_translations.it: Event Organizer (EVO) è un'applicazione web autonoma per valutare le proposte di eventi co-progettate fatte con il plugin ECO WordPress e organizzare gli eventi nella pratica. EVO integra il caso d'uso ZGZ fornendo strumenti amministrativi per promuovere la co-progettazione di eventi e implementare le migliori proposte. EVO comprende funzionalità per gestire le risorse e i servizi disponibili e assegnarli alle richieste avanzate nelle proposte di eventi. Inoltre, EVO può essere utilizzato per organizzare sondaggi di co-valutazione per analizzare diversi aspetti della proposta al fine di scoprire quali proposte sono pronte per l'attuazione.
description_translations.lv: Pasākumu organizētājs (EVO) ir patstāvīga tīmekļa aplikācija kopīgi veidoto pasākumu pieteikumu, kas veidoti ar ECO WordPress spraudni, vērtēšanai un praktiskai organizēšanai. EVO papildina Saragosas gadījumu, sniedzot administratīvus rīkus pasākumu kopīgai veidošanai un labāko piedāvājumu ieviešanai. EVO satur funkcijas pieejamo resursu un pakalpojumu vadīšanai un to piešķiršanai atkarībā no pieteikumos iekļautajiem pieprasījumiem. Papildus tam EVO var tikt izmantots kopējā izvērtējuma aptauju veidošanai, lai analizētu dažādus pieteikumu parametrus nolūkā identificēt ieviešanai gatavos pieteikumus.

description_translations.en: This is a model of End Users' Perceptions Questionnaire. It aims to measure end-users' perceptions on user-based quality, value-based quality, trust and acceptance. This questionnaire is thought to be answered by users of traditional e-services and also those who co-produced them through INTERLINK.
description_translations.es: Se trata de un modelo de Cuestionario de Percepción de los Usuarios Finales. Su objetivo es medir las percepciones de los usuarios finales sobre la calidad basada en el usuario, la calidad basada en el valor, la confianza y la aceptación. Este cuestionario está pensado para que lo contesten los usuarios de los servicios electrónicos tradicionales y también los que los coproducen a través de INTERLINK.
description_translations.it: Questo è un modello di questionario sulla percezione degli utenti finali. Mira a misurare le percezioni degli utenti finali sulla qualità basata sull'utente, sulla qualità basata sul valore, sulla fiducia e sull'accettazione. Il questionario è pensato per ricevere risposta dagli utenti dei servizi tradizionali e anche da coloro che li hanno co-prodotti tramite INTERLINK.
description_translations.lv: Šis ir gala lietotāju uztveres aptaujas modelis. Tās mērķis ir izmērīt gala lietotāju uztveri un uz lietotāju balstīto kvalitāti, uz vērtībām balstīto kvalitāti, uzticamību un pieņemšanu. Šī aptauja paredzēta tipisko e-pakalpojumu lietotājiem, kā arī tiem lietotājiem, kuri kopīgi tos veidojuši INTERLINK platformā.

Aborda una serie de preguntas sobre las prácticas de colaboración anteriores o actuales, la dinámica de la colaboración (calendario, personas, herramientas, canales de comunicación), los KPI actuales, los aspectos críticos y los desiderata.

Affronta una serie di domande sulle pratiche di collaborazione precedenti o attuali, le dinamiche della collaborazione (timeline, persone, strumenti, canali di comunicazione), KPI attuali, aspetti critici e desiderata.

description_translations.en: This is a model of a questionnaire aimed to measure co-producer's perceptions on user-based quality, value-based quality, trust and acceptance. This questionnaire is thought to be answered by those who take part in the co-production of a public service or reuse artefacts (public services & INTERLINKERs) made available through INTERLINK co-production tools (Collaborative Environment and Catalogue).
description_translations.es: Este es un modelo de cuestionario destinado a medir las percepciones de los coproductores sobre la calidad basada en el usuario, la calidad basada en el valor, la confianza y la aceptación. Este cuestionario está pensado para ser respondido por quienes participan en la coproducción de un servicio público o de artefactos de reutilización (servicios públicos e INTERLINKERs) puestos a disposición a través de las herramientas de coproducción de INTERLINK (Entorno Colaborativo y Catálogo).
description_translations.it: Questo è un modello di questionario volto a misurare le percezioni del coproduttore sulla qualità basata sull'utente, sulla qualità basata sul valore, sulla fiducia e sull'accettazione. Si ritiene che a questo questionario rispondano coloro che partecipano alla coproduzione di un servizio pubblico o riutilizzano manufatti (servizi pubblici e INTERLINKER) messi a disposizione attraverso gli strumenti di coproduzione INTERLINK (Ambiente e Catalogo Collaborativi).
description_translations.lv: Šis ir aptaujas modelis koprades procesa dalībnieku uztveres (uz lietotāju balstīta kvalitāte, uz vērtībām balstīta kvalitāte, uzticamība un pieņemšana) mērīšanai. Šī aptauja paredzēta koprades procesa dalībniekiem, kuri iesaistās publiskā pakalpojuma vai vairāklietojamo artefaktu (publiskie pakalpojumi un INTERLINKERi) kopradē. Tā ir pieejama INTERLINK koprades rīkos (Sadarbības vide un Katalogs).

description_translations.en:
This template of an excel file can be used in conjunction with the Stakeholders Mapping Canvas to identify by name and title the people, groups, and organisations that have significant influence on project direction and its success or who are significantly impacted by the project. The template helps in planning Stakeholders engagement according to different dimensions:


  • the desired or expected level of involvement
  • potential issues related to their engagement
  • motivations and barriers that can support you in finding the best strategy to engage them in the co-production process
  • expectation of the different Stakeholders
  • skills and potential role within the co-production process.
description_translations.es:
This template of an excel file can be used in conjunction with the Stakeholders Mapping Canvas to identify by name and title the people, groups, and organisations that have significant influence on project direction and its success or who are significantly impacted by the project. The template helps in planning Stakeholders engagement according to different dimensions:


  • the desired or expected level of involvement
  • potential issues related to their engagement
  • motivations and barriers that can support you in finding the best strategy to engage them in the co-production process
  • expectation of the different Stakeholders
  • skills and potential role within the co-production process.
description_translations.it:
Questo modello di file excel può essere utilizzato insieme allo Stakeholders Mapping Canvas per identificare per nome e titolo le persone, i gruppi e le organizzazioni che hanno un'influenza significativa sulla direzione del progetto e sul suo successo o che sono significativamente influenzati dal progetto . Il modello aiuta a pianificare il coinvolgimento degli stakeholder in base a diverse dimensioni:


  • il livello di coinvolgimento desiderato o previsto
  • potenziali problemi legati al loro coinvolgimento
  • motivazioni e barriere che possono supportarti nella ricerca della migliore strategia per coinvolgerli nel processo di coproduzione
  • aspettative dei diversi Stakeholders
  • competenze e ruolo potenziale all'interno del processo di coproduzione.
  • >
description_translations.lv:
Šis Excel faila paraugs var tikt izmantots kopā ar ieinteresēto pušu kartēšanas rīku, lai pēc vārda un nosaukuma identificētu cilvēkus, grupas un organizācijas, kurām ir nozīmīga ietekme uz projekta virzību un iznākumu vai uz kuriem projekts atstās nozīmīgu ietekmi. Paraugs palīdz plānot ieinteresēto pušu iesaisti saskaņā ar dažādām dimensijām:


  • vēlamais vai paredzamais iesaistes līmenis
  • iespējamās problēmas, kas saistītas ar viņu iesaisti
  • motivācijas faktori un barjeras, kas var palīdzēt izvēlēties labāko stratēģiju viņu iesaistei koprades procesā
  • dažādu ieinteresēto pušu ekspektācijas
  • prasmes un iespējamā loma koprades procesā.

description_translations.en:
Augmenter is an Open Source application that offers the possibility of create and improve public services descriptions, in the workspace users can share opinions, questions and feedbacks, finally a assigned moderator will decide approve or not a suggestion. With Augmenter it is possible to

  • create and improve public service descriptions, organize discussions and keep record of participation and involvement;
  • manage moderator decisions over the improvements;
  • Generate a final improvement report.
description_translations.es:
Augmenter es una aplicación Open Source que ofrece la posibilidad de crear y mejorar descripciones de servicios públicos, en el espacio de trabajo los usuarios pueden compartir opiniones, preguntas y comentarios, finalmente un moderador asignado decidirá aprobar o no una sugerencia. Con Augmenter es posible

  • Crear y mejorar descripciones de servicios públicos, organizar dicusiones y mantener un registro de participación e implicación;
  • administrar las decisiones del moderador sobre las mejoras;
  • Generar un informe final de mejora.
description_translations.it:
Augmenter è un'applicazione Open Source che offre la possibilità di creare e migliorare le descrizioni dei servizi pubblici, nell'area di lavoro gli utenti possono condividere opinioni, domande e feedback, infine un moderatore incaricato deciderà di approvare o meno un suggerimento. Con Augmenter è possibile

  • creare e migliorare le descrizioni dei servizi pubblici, organizzare discussioni e tenere traccia della partecipazione e del coinvolgimento;
  • gestire le decisioni dei moderatori sui miglioramenti;
  • Genera un rapporto di miglioramento finale.
description_translations.lv:
Augmenter ir atvērtā koda lietotne, kas piedāvā iespēju veidot un uzlabot publisko pakalpojumu aprakstus. Lietotnes darbavietā lietotājiem ir iespēja dalīties ar viedokļiem, jautājumiem un ierosinājumiem, un procesa moderators pieņem lēmumu apstiprināt vai noraidīt priekšlikumu. Ar Augmenter ir iespējams

  • izveidot un uzlabot publisko pakalpojumu aprakstus, organizēt diskusijas un veikt dalības un iesaistes uzskaiti;
  • vadīt moderatora lēmumus par nepieciešamajiem uzlabojumiem;
  • izveidot nepieciešamo uzlabojumu ziņojuma galaversiju.

view_text_translations.es: Abrir una página con descripciones para anotar

description_translations.en:
Google Drive is a file storage and synchronization service developed by Google. Launched on April 24, 2012, Google Drive allows users to store files in the cloud, synchronize files across devices, and share files.
Google Drive encompasses Google Docs, Google Sheets, and Google Slides, which are a part of the Google Docs Editors office suite that permits collaborative editing of documents, spreadsheets, presentations, drawings, forms, and more. Files created and edited through the Google Docs suite are saved in Google Drive.
This software INTERLIKER allows users of the collaborative environment to create new documents, spreadsheets and presentations which can be co-edited and shared by co-production team participants
description_translations.es:
Google Drive es un servicio de almacenamiento y sincronización de archivos desarrollado por Google. Lanzado el 24 de abril de 2012, Google Drive permite a los usuarios almacenar archivos en la nube, sincronizar archivos entre dispositivos y compartir archivos.
Google Drive incluye Google Docs, Google Sheets y Google Slides, que forman parte de Google Docs Editors. paquete ofimático que permite la edición colaborativa de documentos, hojas de cálculo, presentaciones, dibujos, formularios y más. Los archivos creados y editados a través de la suite Google Docs se guardan en Google Drive.
Este software INTERLIKER permite a los usuarios del entorno colaborativo crear nuevos documentos, hojas de cálculo y presentaciones que pueden ser coeditados y compartidos por los participantes del equipo de coproducción.
description_translations.it:
Google Drive è un servizio di archiviazione e sincronizzazione di file sviluppato da Google. Lanciato il 24 aprile 2012, Google Drive consente agli utenti di archiviare file nel cloud, sincronizzare file tra dispositivi e condividere file.
Google Drive comprende Google Docs, Google Sheets e Google Slides, che fanno parte della suite per ufficio di Google Docs Editors che consente la modifica collaborativa di documenti, fogli di lavoro, presentazioni, disegni, moduli e altro ancora. I file creati e modificati tramite la suite Google Docs vengono salvati in Google Drive.
Questo INTERLIKER software consente agli utenti dell'ambiente collaborativo di creare nuovi documenti, fogli di calcolo e presentazioni che possono essere modificati e condivisi dai partecipanti del team di coproduzione
description_translations.lv:
Google Drive ir failu uzglabāšanas un sinhronizēšanas pakalpojums, ko izstrādājis Google. Pakalpojums uzsāka darbību 2012. gada 24. aprīlī. Google Drive ļauj lietotājiem uzglabāt failus mākonī, sinhronizēt tos starp dažādām ierīcēm un dalīties ar tiem.
Google Drive sastāv no Google Docs, Google Sheets un Google Slides, kas ir daļa no Google Docs Editors biroja komplekta, kas ļauj kopīgi rediģēt dokumentus, izklājlapas, prezentācijas, zīmējumus, formas u.c. Google Docs izveidotie un rediģētie faili tiek saglabāti Google Drive.
Šis programmatūras INTERLINKERs ļauj sadarbības vides lietotājiem veidot jaunus dokumentus, izklājlapas un prezentācijas, kas var tikt kopēji rediģētas un izplatītas starp koprades komandas dalībniekiem.

name_translations.it: Google Drive

description_translations.en:
This interlinker uses etherpad, an open source online editor, to provide collaborative editing in really real-time.
Etherpad (https://etherpad.org/) is an open-source, web-based collaborative real-time editor, allowing authors to simultaneously edit a text document, and see all of the participants' edits in real-time, with the ability to display each author's text in their own color. There is also a chat box in the sidebar to allow meta communication.
description_translations.es:
Este interlinker utiliza etherpad, un editor online de código abierto, para ofrecer una edición colaborativa en tiempo real.
Etherpad (https://etherpad.org/) es un editor colaborativo en tiempo real de código abierto basado en la web, que permite a los autores editar simultáneamente un documento de texto y ver las ediciones de todos los participantes en tiempo real, con la posibilidad de mostrar el texto de cada autor en su propio color. También hay un cuadro de chat en la barra lateral para permitir la meta-comunicación.
description_translations.it:
Questo interlinker utilizza etherpad, un editor online open source, per fornire editing collaborativo in tempo reale.
Etherpad (https://etherpad.org/) è un editor collaborativo in tempo reale open source basato sul Web, che consente agli autori di modificare contemporaneamente un documento di testo e vedere tutte le modifiche dei partecipanti in tempo reale, con il possibilità di visualizzare il testo di ogni autore nel proprio colore. C'è anche una casella di chat nella barra laterale per consentire la meta-comunicazione.
description_translations.lv:
Šis INTERLINKERs izmanto atvērtā koda tiešsaistes redaktoru Etherpad, lai sniegtu kopīgas redigēšanas iespējas reālajā laikā.
Etherpad (https://etherpad.org/) ir tīmeklī balstīts atvērtā koda reālā laika kopīgās rediģēšanas rīks, kas ļauj dokumenta autoriem rediģēt teksta dokumentu un ļauj redzēt visu dalībnieku veiktās izmaiņas reālajā laikā. Tiek nodrošināta iespēja katra dalībnieka tekstu pārādīt citā krāsā. Rīkam ir arī tērzēšanas logs, kas ļauj veikt sekundāro komunikāciju.

name_translations.it: Editor collaborativo

description_translations.en: Survey designer and publishing INTERLINKER which allows to create on demand new forms to gather information or help in decision making in co-production processess. It is based on open source tool SurveyJs (https://github.com/surveyjs)
description_translations.es: Diseñador y editor de encuestas INTERLINKER que permite crear bajo demanda nuevos formularios para recoger información o ayudar a la toma de decisiones en procesos de coproducción. Está basado en la herramienta de código abierto SurveyJs (https://github.com/surveyjs)
description_translations.it: L INTERLINKER Survey designer and publishing permette di creare on demand nuovi moduli per raccogliere informazioni o aiutare nel processo decisionale nei processi di coproduzione. Si basa sullo strumento open source SurveyJs (https://github.com/surveyjs)
description_translations.lv: Aptauju veidošanas un publicēšanas INTERLINKERs, kas ļauj izveidot un pieprasīt jaunas formas informācijas ievākšanai vai palīdzēt koprades procesā radušos lēmumu pieņemšanai. Tas ir balstīts uz atvērtā koda rīku SurveyJS (https://github.com/surveyjs)

name_translations.it: Survey editor

description_translations.en:
Loomio is an Open Source solution that offers a workspace for conversation, sharing information and opinions, making proposals, deciding actions and achieving outcomes. With Loomio it is possible to

  • start and organize discussions and keep record of participation and involvement;
  • manage collaborative decisions through different forms of polls, surveys, etc;
  • enable collaborating voting around ideas and proposal under discussion.
description_translations.es:
Loomio is an Open Source solution that offers a workspace for conversation, sharing information and opinions, making proposals, deciding actions and achieving outcomes. Con Loomio es posible

  • iniciar y organizar discusiones y mantener un registro de la participación e implicación;
  • gestionar las decisiones colaborativas a través de diferentes formas de sondeos, encuestas, etc;
  • permitir la votación colaborativa en torno a ideas y propuestas en discusión.
description_translations.it:
Loomio è una soluzione Open Source che offre uno spazio di lavoro per la conversazione, la condivisione di informazioni e opinioni, la formulazione di proposte, la decisione di azioni e il raggiungimento di risultati. Con Loomio è possibile

  • avviare e organizzare discussioni e tenere traccia della partecipazione e del coinvolgimento;
  • gestire decisioni collaborative attraverso diverse forme di sondaggi, sondaggi, ecc;
  • li>
  • consentire di collaborare votando su idee e proposte in discussione.
description_translations.lv:
Loomio ir atvērtā koda risinājums, kas piedāvā darbavietu sarunām, informācijas un viedokļu apmaiņai, priekšlikumu izteikšanai, lēmumu pieņemšanai un mērķu sasniegšanai. Ar Loomio ir iespējams

  • uzsākt un organizēt diskusijas un sekot līdzi dalībai un iesaistei;
  • vadīt sadarbībā balstītus lēmumus ar dažādu balsojumu, aptauju u.c. rīku palīdzību;
  • aktivizēt kopīgus balsojumus par idejām un priekšlikumiem, kas tiek apspriesti.

instantiate_text_translations.en: Create a discussion thread in Loomio

name_translations.it: Loomio

overview_text.en: Web-based tool for collaborative decision making, discussion. and idea management

description_translations.en: This problem refers to the need to support the initiators of a co-production project to describe the main aim and expected benefit of establishing a collaborative network of stakeholders and engaging them in the co-production process
description_translations.es: Este problema se refiere a la necesidad de apoyar a los iniciadores de un proyecto de coproducción para que describan el objetivo principal y el beneficio esperado de establecer una red de colaboración de las partes interesadas y hacerlas participar en el proceso de coproducción
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di supportare gli iniziatori di un progetto di co-produzione nella descrizione dell'obiettivo principale e dei benefici che si attendono dalla creazione di una rete collaborativa di stakeholders e dal loro coinvolgimento nel processo di co-produzione.
description_translations.lv: Šī problēma attiecas uz nepieciešamību atbalstīt kopražošanas projekta iniciatorus, lai aprakstītu galveno mērķi un paredzamo ieguvumu, izveidojot ieinteresēto personu sadarbības tīklu un iesaistot tās kopražošanas procesā.

functionality_translations.en:
To solve this problem, the following knowledge enablers would be helpful:
- a template to guide the preparation of the problem description, a tentative list of possible stakeholders, and (brief) draft scenarios. Possible template fields are for example:
Title for the co-production initiative
Context and description
Actual organization of the service
Limits/challenges of the actual service / initiatives
Future/desired scenario
Key Actors and roles
Related initiatives and projects
Available resources and links to other relevant documents
- examples of template filing  for inspiration

name_translations.it: Descrizione degli obiettivi di progetto

description_translations.en: This item refers to the problem of preparing a workplan that summarizes the coproduction steps, the timeline and the milestones for the collaborative project. The workplan needs to be sharable with the other members of the collaborative network and updatable as the project progresses.
description_translations.es: Este punto se refiere al problema de preparar un plan de trabajo que resuma los pasos de la coproducción, el calendario y los hitos del proyecto de colaboración. El plan de trabajo debe poder compartirse con los demás miembros de la red de colaboración y actualizarse a medida que avanza el proyecto.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce all'utilità di preparare un piano di lavoro che riassuma le fasi di co-produzione, lo sviluppo temporale e le tappe salienti di un progetto collaborativo. Il piano di lavoro deve poter essere condiviso con gli altri membri della rete collaborativa e deve essere aggiornabile man mano che il progetto progredisce.
description_translations.lv: Šis punkts attiecas uz problēmu, kas saistīta ar darba plāna sagatavošanu, kurā apkopoti kopražošanas soļi, laika grafiks un sadarbības projekta starpposma mērķi. Darba plānam jābūt samērojamam ar citiem sadarbības tīkla dalībniekiem un atjaunināmam projekta gaitā.

functionality_translations.en:
Knowledge resources to support the preparation of the workplan should include:
- a visual template that highlights the (possibly iterative) stages of a co-production process, based on the knowledge distilled in WP2
- examples of instantiated project workplans for inspiration.
Different workplan templates should be made available to fit different governance models and different application domains. 

For co-production processes of large dimensions and complexity, desired functionalities include software tools that support a dynamic update of the workplan, with the additional management of milestones, tasks status, assignment of activities to people, with functionalities like:
Gantt and milestones representation
task management (creation, distribution and monitor)
time tracking
issues management

name_translations.es: Plan de trabajo y gestión de proyectos
name_translations.it: Piano di lavoro e gestione del progetto

description_translations.en: This problem refers to the need to ensure authentication to applications and secure services.
description_translations.es: Este problema se refiere a la necesidad de garantizar la autenticación de las aplicaciones y los servicios seguros.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di garantire autenticazione e accesso sicuro ai servizi.
description_translations.lv: Šī problēma attiecas uz nepieciešamību nodrošināt autentifikāciju lietojumprogrammām un drošiem pakalpojumiem.

functionality_translations.en:
The INTERLINKERs solving this problem  need to satisfy eID compliance and GDPR compliance. The following functionalities are envisaged:
Authentication
Authentication based on OAuth2.0/ OpenID Connect protocol and identity management using external Identity Providers (social, national, eID)
User Information
Information about the currently authenticated user as of OpenID Connect APIs
Authorization/Role management
Create  user groups
Add user to a group with the specified roles
Change roles of the user within the group

name_translations.it: Registrazione e autenticazione

description_translations.en: This problem item addresses the need to develop appropriate strategies for communicating the initiative, to actually contact stakeholders and schedule meetings
description_translations.es: Este punto del problema aborda la necesidad de desarrollar estrategias adecuadas para comunicar la iniciativa, para contactar realmente con las partes interesadas y programar reuniones
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di sviluppare appropriate strategie per comunicare l'iniziativa, contattare gli stakeholder e pianificare gli incontri.
description_translations.lv: Šajā problemātiskajā jautājumā ir pievērsta uzmanība nepieciešamībai izstrādāt atbilstošas stratēģijas, lai informētu par iniciatīvu, faktiski sazinātos ar ieinteresētajām personām un plānotu sanāksmes

functionality_translations.en:
To solve this problem the following resources should be made available: 
-   guidelines for a communication plan and contact strategy
- software tools that support the easy preparation and distribution of communication material within the network, and the scheduling of meetings. Useful functionalities for team communication are:
- email automation for personalization
- pre-designed templates for newsletters
- rich text and embedded forms
- reports on opens and clicks
Useful functionalities for meeting scheduling are:
- calendar presentation
- meeting organization and scheduling
- meeting participants invitation management
- share participants time slot availability

name_translations.es: Comunicación en equipo para la coproducción
name_translations.it: Comunicazione per il team di co-produzione

description_translations.en: This problem refers to the need to support the initiators of a co-production project to plan the active involvement of relevant actors in the co-production team. This problem is related to UND_PROBLEM_2 “Stakeholder mapping” that provides knowledge on how effective and balanced co-production teams can be created, which are the different types of stakeholders, their motivations and potential role in the project.
description_translations.es: Este problema se refiere a la necesidad de apoyar a los iniciadores de un proyecto de coproducción para planificar la participación activa de los actores relevantes en el equipo de coproducción. Este problema está relacionado con el UND_PROBLEM_2 "Mapeo de las partes interesadas" que proporciona conocimientos sobre cómo se pueden crear equipos de coproducción eficaces y equilibrados, cuáles son los diferentes tipos de partes interesadas, sus motivaciones y su papel potencial en el proyecto.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di supportare gli iniziatori di un progetto di co-produzione nel pianificare il coinvolgimento attivo di potenziali portatori di interesse all'interno del team di co-produzione. Questo problema è collegato alla "Mappatura degli Stakeholder" il cui obiettivo è fornire conoscenza su come creare un team di co-produzione efficace e bilanciato, su quali siano i diversi tipi rilevanti di stakeholder, le loro motivazioni e ruolo potenziale nel progetto.
description_translations.lv: Šī problēma attiecas uz nepieciešamību atbalstīt kopražojuma projekta iniciatorus, lai plānotu attiecīgo dalībnieku aktīvu iesaistīšanos kopražojuma komandā. Šī problēma ir saistīta ar UND_PROBLEM_2 “Ieinteresēto personu kartēšana”, kas sniedz informāciju par to, kā var izveidot efektīvas un līdzsvarotas kopražojuma grupas, kas ir dažādu veidu ieinteresētās personas, to motivācija un iespējamā loma projektā.

functionality_translations.en:
To solve this problem, the following knowledge enablers would be helpful:
- Digital template (excel file) to describe for the potential stakeholders identified during the "Stakeholders mapping" (UND_PROBLEM_2):
1. the desired or expected level of involvement
2. potential issues related to their engagement
3. motivations and barriers that can support finding the best strategy to engage them in the co-production process. 
4. responsible person
5. timing of engagement during the different stages of the co-production process
- Example of template filled  for inspiration
Research activities in progress within tasks T5.2 and T5.4  will contribute findings that will help further detail methods for stakeholders engagement, as will be documented in Deliverable D5.1 (M12).

name_translations.es: Plan de participación de las partes interesadas
name_translations.it: Piano di coinvolgimento degli stakeholder

description_translations.en: This problem addresses the need that might emerge at different stages of a coproduction initiative to collaboratively produce and share documents. Tasks may include the need to organize and manage documents among the coproduction team members, share documents among stakeholders, and help multiple people in the team work together on files to achieve a single final version.
description_translations.es: Este problema aborda la necesidad que puede surgir en diferentes etapas de una iniciativa de coproducción para producir y compartir documentos de forma colaborativa. Las tareas pueden incluir la necesidad de organizar y gestionar los documentos entre los miembros del equipo de coproducción, compartir documentos entre las partes interesadas y ayudar a varias personas del equipo a trabajar juntas en los archivos para lograr una única versión final.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità che può emergere in diverse fasi di una iniziativa di co-produzione di produrre documenti in modo collaborativo e condividerli. Le attività possono includere l'organizzazione e gestione di documenti visibili da più persone, la condivisione con altri stakeholder, il supporto al lavoro collaborativo di più persone sullo stesso file per raggiungere un'unica versione finale.
description_translations.lv: Šī problēma attiecas uz vajadzību, kas varētu rasties dažādos kopražošanas iniciatīvas posmos, lai kopīgi sagatavotu un dalītos ar dokumentiem. Uzdevumi var ietvert nepieciešamību organizēt un pārvaldīt dokumentus kopražošanas grupas dalībnieku vidū, koplietot dokumentus starp ieinteresētajām personām un palīdzēt vairākiem grupas darbiniekiem strādāt kopā ar failiem, lai iegūtu vienu galīgo versiju.

functionality_translations.en:
To solve this problem, software tools are required to support functionalities like: 
- authentication and authorization
- document creation and editing, track changes
- document storage (retrieve content, document versioning)
- management of dedicated repositories for each service co-creation project 
- management of access rights granted only to members of the working group
- support for different document formats

name_translations.it: Collaborazione su documenti

description_translations.en: This problem refers to the need of using maps or charts to help the co-production team understand different measurable aspects for a public service, like for example: variables describing the context of the service, KPIs, evaluation variables like usability, acceptance, easy to use, quality of service
description_translations.es: Este problema se refiere a la necesidad de utilizar mapas o gráficos para ayudar al equipo de coproducción a entender diferentes aspectos medibles para un servicio público, como por ejemplo: variables que describen el contexto del servicio, KPIs, variables de evaluación como usabilidad, aceptación, facilidad de uso, calidad del servicio
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di usare delle mappe o dei grafici per aiutare il team di co-produzione a comprendere diversi aspetti misurabili relativi ad un servizio pubblico, come ad esempio: variabili che descrivono il contesto del servizio, indicatori di performance, dimensioni di valutazione come usabilità, accettabilità, facilità d'uso, qualità del servizio.
description_translations.lv: Šī problēma attiecas uz karšu vai diagrammu izmantošanu, lai palīdzētu kopražošanas grupai izprast dažādus mērāmus aspektus sabiedriskajiem pakalpojumiem, piemēram: mainīgie lielumi, kas raksturo pakalpojuma kontekstu, KPI, vērtēšanas mainīgie, piemēram, izmantojamība, akceptēšana, ērta lietošana, pakalpojuma kvalitāte

functionality_translations.en:
To support the team in visualizing data, software tools are required to;
upload large sets of  data 
handle and manage geographic information
output different chart, graph and map types
possible output in form of report
visualize interactive on-line maps/charts
create dashboards

name_translations.it: Visualizzazione di dati

description_translations.en: This problem relates to the need to support open discussion among the coproduction team members. E.g. Discussion forum where the co-creation team can discuss ideas, service features, plan actions.
description_translations.es: Este problema está relacionado con la necesidad de apoyar el debate abierto entre los miembros del equipo de coproducción. Por ejemplo, un foro de debate en el que el equipo de cocreación pueda discutir ideas, características del servicio y planificar acciones.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di supportare discussioni aperte all'interno del gruppo di lavoro sulla co-produzione. Ad esempio, forum di discussione dove i membri del team possano scambiare idee, requisiti o funzionalità del servizio, piani di attività.
description_translations.lv: Šī problēma ir saistīta ar nepieciešamību atbalstīt atklātās diskusijas starp koopražošanas grupas dalībniekiem. Piemēram, Diskusiju forums, kurā koprades komanda var apspriest idejas, pakalpojuma funkcijas, plānot darbības.

functionality_translations.en:
To support the team in online discussions, software tools are required to;
support conversation on threads
provide notification of discussions
moderate contents
provide administrative dashboards
manage discussion groups
support polls for decision making

name_translations.it: Spazio di discussione

description_translations.en: This problem item addresses the need to support the co-production team in defining an agreement for not disclosing confidential information that they need to share with each other as a necessary part of co-producing a service together.
description_translations.es: Este punto del problema aborda la necesidad de apoyar al equipo de coproducción en la definición de un acuerdo para no revelar la información confidencial que necesitan compartir entre sí como parte necesaria de la coproducción de un servicio conjunto.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di supportare il team di co-produzione nella definizione di un accordo di riservatezza relativo all'informazione condivisa all'interno del gruppo di lavoro durante le fasi di co-produzione collaborativa di un servizio.
description_translations.lv: Šajā problemjautājumā ir pievērsta uzmanība nepieciešamībai atbalstīt kopražojuma komandu, vienojoties par konfidenciālas informācijas neizpaušanu, kas tām ir jāizplata viena otrai kā nepieciešama daļa no kopīga pakalpojuma.

functionality_translations.en:
Knowledge enablers solving this problem should  contain descriptive text that explains the rationale and the benefit of preparing and signing a NDA, as well as, templates for guiding the preparation of the agreement, and examples of NDA agreements for the co-production of services.
The baseline agreement template should cover:
- Overall aim and domain of the NDA  agreement
- Type of agreement: mutual vs non-mutual
- List of parties involved
- Definition of what is deemed to be confidential
- The scope of the confidentiality obligation by the receiving party
- The exclusions from confidential treatment
- The term of the agreement
- Obligations
- Duration of the agreement

name_translations.it: Definizione di accordi di riservatezza

description_translations.en:
This problem item addresses the need for information about good practices, templates and examples for preparing documents that define in a formal way agreements for a collaborative network of stakeholders. This need may emerge during the initial engagement of the stakeholders to write
down the terms and general plan for the collaboration. When co-evaluation takes
place on the outcome of the collaboration with respect to what was specified in the
partnership agreement, possible revisions of the document may need to be
introduced.
description_translations.es: Este punto del problema aborda la necesidad de información sobre buenas prácticas, plantillas y ejemplos para preparar documentos que definan de manera formal los acuerdos para una red de colaboración de las partes interesadas. Esta necesidad puede surgir durante el compromiso inicial de las partes interesadas para redactar de las partes interesadas para redactar los términos y el plan general de la colaboración. Cuando se produce la coevaluación del resultado de la colaboración con respecto a lo especificado en el acuerdo de colaboración, puede ser necesario introducir posibles revisiones del documento.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di disporre di informazioni relative a buone pratiche, modelli ed esempi per preparare documenti che definiscono in modo formale accordi di collaborazione per una rete di stakeholder. Questa necessità può emergere durante il coinvolgimento iniziale degli stakeholder per elencare i termini ed il piano generale di collaborazione. Possibili revisioni al documento di accordo possono essere necessarie durante le fasi di valutazione iterativa dei risultati della collaborazione rispetto agli accordi iniziali.
description_translations.lv: Šis problemātiskais jautājums attiecas uz vajadzību pēc informācijas par labu praksi, veidnēm un piemēriem dokumentu sagatavošanai, kas oficiālā veidā nosaka nolīgumus par ieinteresēto personu sadarbības tīklu. Šī vajadzība var rasties ieinteresēto personu sākotnējās iesaistes laikā, lai reģistrētu sadarbības noteikumus un vispārējo plānu. Kad notiek kopvērtējums pamatojoties uz sadarbības rezultātiem attiecībā uz partnerības nolīgumā noteikto, iespējams, būs jāievieš iespējamie dokumenta grozījumi.

functionality_translations.en:
Knowledge enablers solving this problem should  contain descriptive text that explains the rationale and the benefit of preparing and signing a partnership agreement, templates for guiding the preparation of the agreement, and examples of successful partnership agreements for the co-production of services.

The baseline agreement template should cover:
- Overall aim and domain of the agreement
- The list of network partners
- Rules for extending the network of stakeholders after the initial agreement signing
- Definition of partner roles and levels of commitment
- Definition of rules of fair play, obligations, rights within the collaborative network
- Contact persons
- Advisory board
- Thematic work groups
- Dissemination and communication plan
- Monitoring and evaluation plan
- Duration

Alternative versions of the agreement template may be required for different governance models (e.g. G2C, C2G, C+G).
Multilingual versions of the agreement templates should be available

name_translations.it: Definizione di accordi di partnership

description_translations.en: This problem item refers to the need to describe the data management life cycle for all data sets that are collected, processed or generated by the co-production of public services.
description_translations.es: Este punto del problema se refiere a la necesidad de describir el ciclo de vida de la gestión de datos para todos los conjuntos de datos que se recogen, procesan o generan por la coproducción de servicios públicos.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di descrivere il ciclo di vita della gestione dei dati per tutte le collezioni di dati raccolte, processate o generate durante la co-produzione di servizi pubblici.
description_translations.lv: Šis problemjautājums attiecas uz nepieciešamību aprakstīt datu pārvaldības dzīves ciklu visām datu kopām, kas tiek iegūtas, apstrādātas vai ģenerētas, kopīgi ražojot sabiedriskos pakalpojumus.

functionality_translations.en:
Knowledge enablers addressing this problem should include  descriptive text that explains the rationale and the benefit of preparing a Data Management Plan, templates for guiding the preparation of the plan, examples of Data Management Plans.
The baseline Data Management Plan template should cover:
Overall aim and domain of the DMP
Motivations to collect data 
Flow of data
Potential impact of data
The handling of data during & after the end of the project
The types of data
Definition of user and supplier pids concerning data? (ownership, minimalization, responsibility, sharing, archiving, anonymity)
Policies for access and sharing
Policies and provisions for re-use
-Plans for archiving data

name_translations.es: Definición del plan de gestión de datos (DPM)
name_translations.it: Definizione di un piano di gestione dei dati

description_translations.en: This problem item addresses the need to provide members of the public with the information they need to understand the project, the decision process, and also to understand how public input influenced the decision
description_translations.es: Este punto del problema aborda la necesidad de proporcionar a los miembros del público la información que necesitan para entender el proyecto, el proceso de decisión, y también para entender cómo las aportaciones del público influyeron en la decisión
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di fornire al pubblico le informazioni che necessitano per comprendere il progetto, il processo decisionale e per comprendere come il loro contributo può influenzare le decisioni.
description_translations.lv: Šī problēma attiecas uz nepieciešamību sniegt sabiedrības locekļiem informāciju, kas viņiem nepieciešama, lai izprastu projektu, lēmumu pieņemšanas procesu, kā arī saprastu, kā sabiedrības ieguldījums ietekmēja lēmumu

functionality_translations.en:
INTERLINKERs addressing this problem need to  provide information and guidelines on how to reach out to citizens and inform them on the creation of innovative public services. Sample methods to inform the public are for example:
In-person methods to inform: public meetings, briefings, telephone contacts
Remote methods to inform: printed and digital  information (fact sheets, newsletters and bulletins), web sites, information repositories, information hotlines, information kiosks, press and media, social media)
All these methods have specific constraints for their application, e.g. preferred number of participants, and contexts they are best suited for, e.g. type of audience or the current phase of the project.  
Activities within INTERLINK WP5 are currently investigating which methods for informing and engaging the public are best suited for the three project use cases

name_translations.it: Informare il pubblico

description_translations.en: This problem item addresses the need to provide members of the public with the possibility to actively participate in the decision process, whenever this is desired by the selected governance model.
description_translations.es: Este punto del problema aborda la necesidad de proporcionar a los miembros del público la posibilidad de participar activamente en el proceso de decisión, siempre que así lo desee el modelo de gobernanza seleccionado.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di consentire alla cittadinanza di partecipare in modo attivo al processo decisionale, qualcosa questo sia previsto dal modello di governance selezionato.
description_translations.lv: Šajā problemātiskajā jautājumā ir pievērsta uzmanība nepieciešamībai nodrošināt sabiedrības locekļiem iespēju aktīvi piedalīties lēmumu pieņemšanas procesā, kad vien tas ir paredzēts izvēlētajā pārvaldības modelī.

functionality_translations.en:
INTERLINKERs addressing this problem need to  provide information and guidelines on how to let public discussion converge and select preferred solutions. Software tools to aid e-voting are also relevant for this problem item. Sample methods for agreement seeking with the public are for example consensus workshops, advisory boards, citizen juries and computer assisted processes that include functionalities like online presentation, interactive polls and Q&A with participants, as well as real time visualization of answers. 
All these methods have specific constraints for their application, e.g. preferred number of participants, and contexts they are best suited for, e.g. type of audience or the current phase of the project.  
Activities within INTERLINK WP5 are currently investigating which methods for consensus building and agreement with the public are best suited for the three project use cases.

name_translations.en: Consensus building and agreement seeking with the public
name_translations.es: Creación de consenso y búsqueda de acuerdos con el público
name_translations.it: Costruzione di consenso e di accordo da parte dei cittadini
name_translations.lv: Vienošanās veidošana un vienošanās meklēšana ar sabiedrību

description_translations.en: This problem item addresses the need of providing guidance on how to develop a shared language among the co-production team members to ensure effective codesign and co-production of services. Developing a shared language is crucial to be able for stakeholders to: i) build a common ground for joint action, ii) share, mutually agree on, and understand a longterm research plan and protocol, iii) to ongoingly evaluate the success or failure of decisions
description_translations.es: Este apartado del problema aborda la necesidad de proporcionar orientación sobre cómo desarrollar un lenguaje compartido entre los miembros del equipo de coproducción para garantizar un codiseño y una coproducción de servicios eficaces. El desarrollo de un lenguaje compartido es crucial para que las partes interesadas puedan: i) construir un terreno común para la acción conjunta, ii) compartir, acordar mutuamente y comprender un plan y un protocolo de investigación a largo plazo, iii) evaluar continuamente el éxito o el fracaso de las decisiones
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di fornire una guida e consigli su come sviluppare una linguaggio condiviso all'interno del team di co-produzione per assicurare attività di co-design e di esecuzione collaborativa dei servizi efficaci. Lo sviluppo di un linguaggio comune è cruciale per consentire agli stakeholder di: i) costruire una base di partenza comune per attività congiunte, ii) condividere, concordare e comprendere un piano ed un protocollo di ricerca a lungo termine, (iii) valutare progressivamente il successo o il fallimento delle decisioni prese.
description_translations.lv: Šajā problemātiskajā jautājumā ir pievērsta uzmanība nepieciešamībai sniegt norādījumus par to, kā izstrādāt kopīgu valodu kopražojuma grupas dalībniekiem, lai nodrošinātu pakalpojumu efektīvu kodēšanu un kopražošanu. Kopīgas valodas izstrāde ir ļoti svarīga, lai ieinteresētās personas varētu: i) izveidot kopīgu pamatu kopīgai rīcībai, ii) dalīties, savstarpēji vienoties un saprast ilgtermiņa pētniecības plānu un protokolu, iii) ongotiski novērtēt lēmumu panākumus vai neveiksmi

functionality_translations.en:
Knowledge enablers coping with this problem should  include  descriptive text that explains the rationale and the benefit of developing a shared language and of valuing the diversity of experiences, skills and values that each participant in the co-production process brings. 
The enablers should propose  activities that the team might perform to create a shared language and value diversity. They should provide guidelines for discussing and exchanging knowledge, to value the knowledge of team members. In co-production processes it is crucial for participants to embrace diversity, to respect different values and knowledge systems.

name_translations.en: Develop a shared language (and value diversity)
name_translations.es: Desarrollar un lenguaje compartido (y valorar la diversidad)
name_translations.it: Sviluppo di un linguaggio condiviso (valorizzando la diversità)

description_translations.en: Citizen participation in collaborative projects strongly depends on their motivation and their willingness to interact with governmental institutions and provide input on the given task.
description_translations.es: La participación de los ciudadanos en los proyectos de colaboración depende en gran medida de su motivación y de su voluntad de interactuar con las instituciones gubernamentales y de hacer aportaciones a la tarea encomendada.
description_translations.it: La partecipazione dei cittadini in progetti collaborativi dipende fortemente dalla loro motivazione e dalla loro disponibilità ad interagire con istituzione governative e a fornire input su task assegnati.
description_translations.lv: Pilsoņu līdzdalība sadarbības projektos ir lielā mērā atkarīga no viņu motivācijas un vēlmes sadarboties ar valsts iestādēm un sniegt ieguldījumu attiecīgajā darbā.

functionality_translations.en:
Enablers related to this problem should provide guidance and tools to track citizens' engagement and reward participation. 
Guidelines and tips on how to monitor citizens' level of engagement and track  activities performed by citizens and other entities engaged in the collaborative process  (e.g. participation in a workshop, submission of ideas on a web portal, attendance to events) 
Guidelines to define the rewarding strategy
Types of rewarding mechanisms  that can be used to sustain, encourage participation, according to the type of audience and depending on the tasks
 intrinsic rewarding  (e.g.: fun, self-realization, challenging tasks etc.)
extrinsic rewarding  (e.g.: financial or non-financial rewards, career improvement, reputation etc.) 
Guidelines and tools to assess and follow-up the user’s engagement and satisfaction level of the public. 
Module to track and follow up the engagement and satisfaction of citizens/participants.

name_translations.it: Fidelizzazione, incentivi e premi

description_translations.en: At different stages of the co-production process stakeholders (including citizens) are contacted, interviewed, asked for ideas and opinions. It is important to inform them about the context and purpose of the data collection and to gather their consent to be able to use the collected data collected in compliance with data protection regulations.
description_translations.es: En las distintas fases del proceso de coproducción se contacta con las partes interesadas (incluidos los ciudadanos), se les entrevista y se les piden ideas y opiniones. Es importante informarles sobre el contexto y la finalidad de la recogida de datos y recabar su consentimiento para poder utilizar los datos recogidos respetando la normativa de protección de datos.
description_translations.it: Durante fasi diverse del processo di co-produzione, gli stakeholder (inclusi i cittadini) vengono contattati, intervistati, incoraggiati a fornire idee ed opinioni. E' importante informarli sul contesto e gli obiettivi della raccolta dati e ottenere il loro consenso all'utilizzo del materiale raccolto in conformità con le normative sulla privacy e la protezione dei dati.
description_translations.lv: Dažādos kopražošanas procesa posmos ar ieinteresētajām personām (tostarp iedzīvotājiem) sazinās, intervē, lūdz idejas un atzinumus. Ir svarīgi informēt tos par datu vākšanas kontekstu un mērķi un apkopot viņu piekrišanu, lai varētu izmantot savāktos datus saskaņā ar datu aizsardzības noteikumiem.

functionality_translations.en:
Knowledge enablers coping with this problem should  include  descriptive guidelines that explain the importance of complying with the GDPR at all stages of co-production.
Templates for inform sheets and consent forms should be provided for different types of venues and data to be collected. Multilinguality and compliance to different national regulations should be supported.

name_translations.it: Raccolta dei consensi

description_translations.en: This item relates to the need of exploring and refining the problem that a service addresses. The service design process is a problem-solving activity and it is important to clearly understand which is the challenge that the team addresses and how more information can be collected to understand how the service should be designed. Guidelines and tools are needed to help teams in discussing initial ideas and assumptions, refine them through structured methods and become aware about the missing information that still needs to be collected.
description_translations.es: Este punto se refiere a la necesidad de explorar y refinar el problema que aborda un servicio. El proceso de diseño de servicios es una actividad de resolución de problemas y es importante entender claramente cuál es el reto que aborda el equipo y cómo se puede recopilar más información para entender cómo debe diseñarse el servicio. Se necesitan directrices y herramientas para ayudar a los equipos a debatir las ideas y suposiciones iniciales, refinarlas mediante métodos estructurados y tomar conciencia de la información que falta por recopilar.
description_translations.it: Questa problematica si riferisce alla necessità di esplorare e raffinare il problema che un servizio deve risolvere. Il processo di disegno di un servizio è essenzialmente una attività di risoluzione di problemi (problem-solving) ed è importante comprendere in modo chiaro quale è la sfida che il team di lavoro deve risolvere e come informazioni aggiuntive possano essere raccolte. Linee guida e strumenti sono necessari per aiutare il team di co-produzione nella discussione delle idee ed assunzioni iniziali, nel loro raffinamento tramite metodi strutturati e nell'identificazione delle informazioni mancanti che devono ancora essere raccolte.
description_translations.lv: Šis punkts ir saistīts ar vajadzību izpētīt un atrisināt problēmu, kas saistīta ar pakalpojumu. Pakalpojuma projektēšanas process ir problēmu risināšanas pasākums, un ir svarīgi skaidri saprast, kas ir uzdevums, ko grupa risina un kā var apkopot plašāku informāciju, lai saprastu, kā pakalpojums ir jāveido. Vadlīnijas un rīki ir vajadzīgi, lai palīdzētu grupām apspriest sākotnējās idejas un pieņēmumus, precizēt tos, izmantojot strukturētas metodes, un uzzināt trūkstošo informāciju, kas vēl jāapkopo.

functionality_translations.en:
The knowledge enablers solving this problem should include descriptive text  that explains the rationale and the benefit of collecting and discussing ideas to refine the problem/challenge. Enablers should propose activities that the team might perform to refine the challenge concept, guiding the application of structured methods to collect and discuss ideas, such as brainstorming, and activities to elicit initial assumptions,  to agree on ideas and refine them. 
This enabler should cover:
- Explanation of  the benefits for defining the challenge and refining the understanding of the problem to be addressed
- Tips to structure an open discussion that value diversity and knowledge exchange
- Methods that can be used to discuss and collaboratively refine the idea, such as a structured brainstorming 
- Guidelines on how to conduct a brainstorming for problem refinement
- Templates that can be used to organize ideas during a brainstorming for problem refinement and identification of missing  information (e.g. Ideas crowdsourcing, data collection through user research,..). 
These knowledge enablers can be associated to the use of a Software  enabler to perform online brainstorming

name_translations.it: Raffinamento collaborativo del problema

description_translations.en: This problem item relates to the need to support the initiators of the co-production process to identify, select and plan the active involvement of stakeholders in the co-production team. It is important that the initiators of a co-production process understand who are the potential stakeholders, which are their motivations to participate and potential barriers, which skills and expertise they might bring in the project, and which type of support they need to fully contribute to the project.
description_translations.es: Este punto del problema se refiere a la necesidad de apoyar a los iniciadores del proceso de coproducción para identificar, seleccionar y planificar la participación activa de las partes interesadas en el equipo de coproducción. Es importante que los iniciadores de un proceso de coproducción comprendan quiénes son los posibles interesados, cuáles son sus motivaciones para participar y los posibles obstáculos, qué habilidades y conocimientos podrían aportar al proyecto y qué tipo de apoyo necesitan para contribuir plenamente al proyecto.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di supportare gli iniziatori di un progetto di co-produzione nel processo di identificazione, selezione e pianificazione del coinvolgimento attivo degli stakeholder all'interno del team di co-produzione. E' importante che gli iniziatori del processo di co-produzione comprendano chi sono i potenziali stakeholder, quali sono le loro motivazioni a partecipare e potenziali barriere, quali competenze ed esperienze possono portare nel progetto, quale tipo di supporto necessitano per contribuire pienamente.
description_translations.lv: Šī problēma attiecas uz nepieciešamību atbalstīt kopražošanas procesa iniciatorus, lai noteiktu, izvēlētos un plānotu ieinteresēto personu aktīvu iesaistīšanos kopražojuma grupā. Ir svarīgi, lai kopražošanas procesa iniciatori izprastu, kas ir potenciālās ieinteresētās personas, kas ir viņu motivācija piedalīties, un iespējamos šķēršļus, kādas prasmes un zināšanas viņi varētu ieviest projektā un kāda veida atbalsts viņiem ir nepieciešams, lai pilnībā piedalītos projektā.

functionality_translations.en:
Knowledge for  "stakeholders mapping" should include:
Guidelines that explain the rationale of the process of stakeholders mapping and analysis and that support the team in selecting relevant stakeholders, that is people directly or indirectly affected by the service  or that can influence the service. Different types of stakeholders exist that have diverse motivations to participate, different skills and potential roles to play in the project: public authorities (public servants and politicians, citizens (potential end-users and experts), private business and non-profit organizations (SMEs, freelance, etc). Also different roles should be considered: 1) service end-users, 2) co-production team, 3) Interlink partners
Guidelines to analyse stakeholders motivations and potential incentives to participate: i) personal, ii) society, iii) financial, iv) governance, iv) research
Templates that support the team in 
creating a stakeholders map, which  is helpful for understanding the complexity of building relationships, realizing which connectors can be crucial for innovation development and why
in making the network balanced, i.e. by 
ensuring inclusiveness, or openness to all who wish to participate
ensuring representativeness, ensuring that the interests of all stakeholders are effectively advocated
ensuring impartiality, or all parties being treated equally
recognising gender and cultural differences
Tangible material to facilitate the stakeholders analysis during a brainstorming (cards for people, roles, possible expectations, etc.)

name_translations.it: Mappatura degli stakeholder

description_translations.en:
This problem item refers to the need to support teams in collecting data and information about users and their behaviour for different purposes and phases of the co-production process, e.g. to better understand a phenomenon, to improve
knowledge on citizens' needs toward services, to measure attitudes and
expectations, to monitor users satisfaction toward a service or a facility.
description_translations.es: Este punto del problema se refiere a la necesidad de apoyar a los equipos en la recopilación de datos e información sobre los usuarios y su comportamiento para diferentes fines y fases del proceso de coproducción, por ejemplo, para comprender mejor un fenómeno, para mejorar conocimiento de las necesidades de los ciudadanos respecto a los servicios, para medir las actitudes y para medir las actitudes y expectativas, o para controlar la satisfacción de los usuarios con respecto a un servicio o instalación.
description_translations.it: Questo problema si riferisce alla necessità di supportare i gruppi di lavoro nella raccolta di dati e informazioni sui potenziali utenti di un servizio ed il loro comportamento. Queste informazioni possono essere utili per diversi scopi e durante varie fasi del processo di co-produzione, ad esempio per comprendere meglio un fenomeno, per migliorare la conoscenza sulle necessità dei cittadini rispetto ai servizi, per misurare attitudini ed aspettative, per monitorare la soddisfazione degli utenti verso un servizio o una struttura.
description_translations.lv: Šī problēma attiecas uz nepieciešamību atbalstīt grupas datu un informācijas vākšanā par lietotājiem un to uzvedību dažādos kopražošanas procesa nolūkos un posmos, piemēram, lai labāk izprastu kādu parādību, uzlabotu zināšanas par iedzīvotāju vajadzībām attiecībā uz pakalpojumiem, novērtētu attieksmi un cerības, uzraudzītu lietotāju apmierinātību pret pakalpojumu vai iekārtu.

functionality_translations.en:
The enablers addressing this problem item should help select the most appropriate data collection methods according to the specific information goals, explaining their pros and cons. For each method presented (e.g. survey, interviews, etc), guidelines and templates should be provided. 
Knowledge enablers should cover articulated guidelines including:
Motivations to perform user research, according to the phase of the process and specific needs in terms of data collection, e.g.:
understand a phenomenon
validate an hypothesis
evaluate a service
monitor service quality
Benefits of collecting data directly from users
Type of data that can be collected and their pro and cons: qualitative vs quantitative 
Description of the different methods to collect data
Guidelines to support the team in deciding which is the best method to use to collect data, according to their informative needs, constraints and skills
The description of the process that should be followed to define a protocol for data collection
Description of how to collect and manage personal information when conducting user studies
Tips on  how to collect data through interviews 
Tips on  how to collect data through focus groups 
Tips on  how to collect data through online surveys  
Tips on  how to collect data through web data 

Specific templates with already validated dimensions and scales are provided to support the set-up of the user research, such as
satisfaction / perceived quality of a service
intention to use / easy to use scale
These knowledge enablers can be associated with the use of Software  tools for surveys.

name_translations.en: Data collection about users and their behavior (user research)
name_translations.es: Recogida de datos sobre los usuarios y su comportamiento (investigación de usuarios)
name_translations.it: Raccolta di dati sugli utenti ed il loro comportamento (ricerca utente)
name_translations.lv: Datu vākšana par lietotājiem un viņu uzvedību (lietotāju izpēte)

description_translations.en: A co-production team might need help to define the targets of the service and the characteristics of the users of the service and which are their main needs and the challenges they experience.
